output.input_text:
CT Chest (High-Resolution)Chronic cough, rule out interstitial lung diseaseFindings:
Lungs: Reticular opacities predominantly in the subpleural regions of both lower lobes, with traction bronchiectasis. No ground-glass opacities or nodules identified.
Pleura: No pleural effusion or thickening.
Mediastinum: No enlarged lymph nodes.
Heart and Great Vessels: Normal in size and morphology.
Bones: No osseous abnormalities.

Impression:
Findings consistent with usual interstitial pneumonia (UIP) pattern.
Suggest clinical correlation for underlying connective tissue disease or idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.
